attributes.action: Wiltshire Council should offer food waste recycling to minimise landfill waste
attributes.additional_details: The green agenda is clear, and of increasing importance. Food waste is readily recycled by other councils around the country. Wiltshire should be offering this service to it's residents to help us all minimise environmental impact.
attributes.background: Wiltshire Council should offer food waste recycling to minimise landfill waste

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
